# The plan

.large[
Course runs 10am - 2pm:

- 10am - 11:45am: 
  - Why Rmarkdown 
  - Installation 
  - Rstudio, what, and why
  - Workflow
  - Using rmarkdown
  - HTML, PDF, and Word
- 11:45am - 12:15pm: light lunch
- 12:15pm - 2pm - course
  - Keyboard shortcuts
  - Figures, Tables, and Captions
  - Customising your Figures
  - Citing Figures, Tables, and Sections
  - Citing Articles and Bibliography Styles
]
